challenges.title: Age Checker
challenges.description: Write a program that checks if age >= 18 and prints 'Adult' or 'Minor'.
hints: Print appropriate message in each branch

challenges.title: Grade Calculator
challenges.description: Given a score, print the letter grade (A: 90+, B: 80+, C: 70+, D: 60+, F: below 60).
hints: Use else if for multiple conditions

challenges.title: Can Drive Check
challenges.description: Check if someone can drive (age >= 16 AND hasLicense is true).

testCases.description: Prints 'Can drive' for age 17 with license

challenges.title: Day of Week
challenges.description: Use 'when' to print if a day number (1-7) is a weekday or weekend.

challenges.title: Count to 10
challenges.description: Use a for loop to print numbers 1 to 10, each on a new line.
hints: Range is inclusive: 1..10 includes both 1 and 10

challenges.title: Sum of Range
challenges.description: Calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to 5 using a for loop.
hints: Use sum += i in the loop

challenges.title: Find Maximum
challenges.description: Find and print the maximum number in a list.

challenges.title: Filter Even Numbers
challenges.description: Filter and print only even numbers from a list.
